content.title: 4 bronze medalsü•â in Kaggle competitions
descriptions: Won 4 solo bronze medals so far in Kaggle, the world's largest machine learning competition.

content.title: 1st placeü•á in 7 out of 16 metrics and 2nd placeü•à in the remaining 9 metrics in the VoiceMOS Challenge 2024 Track1
descriptions: Took the above ranking in a global competition to create a machine learning model to predict the naturalness MOS of synthetic speech.

content.title: 1st Place, Hackathon by AIFUL (aihack2024)ü•á
descriptions: Developed a machine learning model for predicting the credit score of individuals.

content.title: Special Prize, 3rd Place, Hackathon by LIFECARDü•â
descriptions: Created a machine learning model for credit scoring.

content.title: World Rank 3, CodinGame Othello AI competitionü•â
descriptions: Developed an AI for the game of Othello by combining deep reinforcement learning and heuristic search algorithms.

content.title: Special Prize, 4th Place in the Final Round, Hackathon by SoftBanküèÖ
descriptions: Developed a web application integrated with object detection AI.

content.title: Outstanding Achievement Award, Deep Reinforcement Learning Spring Seminar, Matsuo LaboratoryüèÖ

descriptions: Developing Optuna, an hyperparameter optimization library, as part of the AutoML team.
Conducting research and development of medical AI in collaboration with physicians.
Created materials on RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and prompt engineering as an LLM Advisor.
Created educational materials on data analysis, LLM usage, algorithms, optimization, etc.
Involved in front-end and back-end implementation, as well as the development of a RAG system using LangChain.
Worked in the Search Group of the Data Promotion Office, developing a RAG system to improve the internal document search experience.

content.company: The University of Tokyo Edge Capital Partners Co., Ltd. (UTEC)
descriptions: Conducting data collection, analysis, and predictive model creation for investors.
Developing a system for an internal tool.
Carried out front-end implementation and proposed UI/UX design for web applications.
Conducted research and development in deep learning related to image recognition.

descriptions: Department of Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management
notes: Conducted research on efficient algorithm design
